de.jackwhite20.japs.client.cache

Interface PubSubCache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncPubSubCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncPubSubCacheImpl, PubSubCacheImpl

    public interface PubSubCache
    Created by JackWhite20 on 13.06.2016.

    • Method Detail

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(boolean force)
        Disconnects the pub sub cache.
        Parameters:
        force - If true, the publisher will not try to reconnect

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnects the pub sub cache without trying to reconnect. Same as invoking disconnect(true).

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
         java.lang.String value,

        value - The value.
        expire - The expire in seconds.

        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.
